explains: adj. 主题的，主旋律的；题目的；语干的
wordGroup: thematic map 专题地图；主题地图

sentences.en: During those years, several things happened, primarily linguistic or thematic and both involving secularization.
sentences.cn: 在那几年发生了一些事情，主要是语言和主题的变化，而且两者都涉及到了世俗化的过程。

sentences.en: The thematic problems that Milton is attempting to tackle are written into the very grammar and the syntax of the poem.
sentences.cn: 弥尔顿试图解决的主题问题被写进了诗歌的语法和句法中。

sentences.en: Journalism cuts through the atwitter state to thematic coherence.
sentences.cn: 新闻穿透推特式的无序状态，直抵一个连贯的主题。
